event.title: ADempiere Japan Users Group / the 13th workshop
event.catch: 日本ADempiere ユーザー会 / 第13回勉強会
event.description:
Time Table

  1. Opening (はじめに)

    • Introduction of ADempeire (ADempiereの紹介)
    • Recent Movements (最近の動き)
  2. Business Part (業務編)

    • Basics of Japanese financial accounting #3 (財務会計の基本)
  3. System Part (システム編)

    • Basic concept of ADempiere (ADempiereの基本コンセプト)
    • ADempiere3.4 ERP Solutions

      • Chap.5 Procurement Activities (仕入業務)
  4. ADempiere-related Topic (ADempiere関連トピック)

    • 会計関連補足説明
  5. Wrap Up (まとめ)

    • Q/A
    • Free Talk (フリーディスカッション)

(USTREAM)

  • ADJUG – the 12th workshop
    http://www.ustream.tv/channel/adjug—-12th-workshop
    2:00 PM – 5:00 PM JST on the 2nd, June
  • ADJUG – testing broadcast
    http://www.ustream.tv/channel/adjug-test
    1:00 PM – 1:15 PM JST on the 27th, June

(Twitter)
#ADJUG
